code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{getAuth,sendPasswordResetEmail}from"firebase/auth";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Reset=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const auth=getAuth();const handleReset=()=>{sendPasswordResetEmail(auth,email).then(()=>{console.log("success");}).catch(error=>{const errorCode=error.code;const errorMessage=error.message;console.log("An error has occured: ",errorCode,errorMessage);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Reset password"}),"Email:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleReset,children:"Reset password"})]});};export default Reset;
